title: Ruthless Reign
description: I was sick of being the girl who ran so this time I stayed. For them. Hardin and Kaleb. But now, thanks to Aodhan, there’s a target on my back.I thought I could trust him, but he threw me to the wolves. It doesn’t matter what he’s done to try to fix it; I should hate him. I should…but I can’t.Until those closest to me are hurt and blood starts to spill in the streets.That’s when I know what I have to do.It’s time to summon a version of Becca Hart that can be just as ruthless as her enemies. If I can’t, I don’t think any of us will make it out alive.Ruthless Reign completes the Kings of Kilborn Univeristy duet. It is a dark romance where the main character doesn't have to choose between love interests. This series contains content that may be triggering to some readers, please read responsibly.
author: Elena Lawson
